documentation.title: Function Spacing
documentation.standard: There should be one blank line before the first function in an OO structure.

code.title: Valid: One blank line before the first function.
Invalid: No blank line before the first function.

documentation.standard: There should be one blank line between functions in an OO structure.

code.title: Valid: One blank line between functions.
Invalid: No blank lines or more than one blank line between functions.

documentation.standard: There should be no blank line after the last function in an OO structure.

code.title: Valid: No blank line after the last function.
Invalid: Blank line(s) after the last function.
